metadata.name: Classic
metadata.description: A classic theme for rendering API documentation in HTML format.
metadata.author: Kambiz Khojasteh

projectSlogan.description: The slogan or tagline of the project.

projectLogoUri.description: The URI of the project logo.

projectLogoDarkUri.description: The URI of the project logo for dark backgrounds. When this is set, 'projectLogoLightUri' is required and 'projectLogoUri' is ignored.

projectLogoLightUri.description: The URI of the project logo for light backgrounds. When this is set, 'projectLogoDarkUri' is required and 'projectLogoUri' is ignored.

styleUri.description: The URI of the custom stylesheet to extend or override the default styles.

scriptUri.description: The URI of the custom script to extend the default functionality.

pageHeader.description: The markdown content for the page header. Template functions and variables can be used here.

pageFooter.description: The markdown content for the page footer. Template functions and variables can be used here.

menuItems.description: Defines the menu bar structure as an array. Each item is an object with 'title' and 'url' properties. To create dropdowns, add an 'items' array of sub-items. At any level, use '*' to auto-insert documentation topics, or '-' to add a divider.

excludeBreadcrumb.description: Determines whether to avoid rendering the breadcrumb navigation.

excludeLeftSidebar.description: Determines whether to avoid rendering the left sidebar, which contains the main navigation.

excludeRightSidebar.description: Determines whether to avoid rendering the right sidebar, which contains the page-specific navigation.

groupTypesByNamespace.description: Determines whether to group types by their namespace in the left sidebar. If true, types are grouped by their namespace; if false, they are listed individually.

showTypeMembersSummary.description: Determines whether to include a summary of type members in the type documentation pages. This is relevant only when each type member has its own documentation page.

seeAlsoSubtopics.description: Whether to automatically include related subtopics as 'see also' references.

popupFileExtensions.description: An array of file extensions (without the leading dot) for which links to local asset files should open in a modal pop-up instead of navigating to the file. By default, includes common text, image, and PDF extensions.
